name: 3dZeropad
author: AFNI Team
description: Adds planes of zeros to a dataset (i.e., pads it out). Negative 'add' count means to cut a dataset down in size.

inputs.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Inferior edge
inputs.name: Inferior padding

inputs.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Superior edge
inputs.name: Superior padding

inputs.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Anterior edge
inputs.name: Anterior padding

inputs.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Posterior edge
inputs.name: Posterior padding

inputs.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Left edge
inputs.name: Left padding

inputs.description: Adds 'n' planes of zero at the Right edge
inputs.name: Right padding

inputs.description: Adds 'n' planes of zeros on EACH of the dataset z-axis (slice-direction) faces
inputs.name: z-axis padding

inputs.description: Add/cut planes symmetrically to make the resulting volume have 'a' slices in the Right/Left direction
inputs.name: Right/Left symmetric padding

inputs.description: Add/cut planes symmetrically to make the resulting volume have 'b' slices in the Anterior/Posterior direction
inputs.name: Anterior/Posterior symmetric padding

inputs.description: Add/cut planes symmetrically to make the resulting volume have 'c' slices in the Inferior/Superior direction
inputs.name: Inferior/Superior symmetric padding

inputs.description: Add 0 or 1 plane in each of the R/A/S directions, giving each axis an even number of slices
inputs.name: Pad to evens

inputs.description: Pad counts 'n' are in mm instead of slices.
inputs.name: Padding in mm

inputs.description: Match the volume described in dataset 'mset'. 'mset' must have the same orientation and grid spacing as dataset to be padded.
inputs.name: Master dataset

inputs.description: Write result into dataset with prefix 'ppp'. Default is 'zeropad'.
inputs.name: Output prefix
